msbt.message: Guess what? I'm TOTALLY going to catch a bug today!Even if it lands on your head, I'll swoop my net down and it'll be mine! The bug. Not your head. You can keep that.
Sigh I've been lugging this fishing pole around so long, my shoulders are all stiff!Maybe I should quit carrying it and just go fishing? Ugh! I don't want to go fishing! I want to look cool!
Well It seems you've caught me holding my watering can, !We're just out for a stroll, talking to the flowers. You would not BELIEVE the hot gossip of the flower world.

There's this one umbrella magazine that says holding an umbrella makes you cuter!Since I can always use a little extra cute, I thought, why not carry an umbrella?Hang on Maybe that wasn't an umbrella magazine? Maybe it was a catalog?
